Name: StorjMonitor
Overview: Storj daemon + CLI; multiple-node in template support; Storjstat.com monitor installed.

Wallet Address.Name: Wallet Address
Wallet Address.Description: Value should be changed to your Wallet address you use for payout.

SHARE_SIZE.Name: SHARE_SIZE
SHARE_SIZE.Description: Example: 500GB, 1TB, 8TB, for each node you start. MAX SIZE=8TB per node.

RPCADDRESS.Name: RPCADDRESS
RPCADDRESS.Description: Your DynamicDNS or external DNS address here. If you need a DDNS service, a free one: is duckdns.org

Number of extra nodes.Name: Number of extra nodes
Number of extra nodes.Description: Storj daemon can run multiple farming nodes at once. The maximum number of nodes per container is number of threads the CPU has.

Custom node-directory name.Name: Custom node-directory name
Custom node-directory name.Description: For multiple nodes this builds your directory, example /storj/thisNameHere#/

Delete log files.Name: Delete log files
Delete log files.Description:
Delete Storj logs on/off switch.
Enable == 'TRUE'

Number of log files to keep (days).Name: Number of log files to keep (days)
Number of log files to keep (days).Description: How many days worth of logs to keep. Deletes everything greater than.

Path of Storj share on array.Name: Path of Storj share on array
Path of Storj share on array.Description: Enter location of your storj share folder on unRAID host.
